titles.title: RIDE Act of 2019
To amend title 23, United States Code, to create a pilot program concerning drugged driving prevention, and for other purposes.
Reinforcing Impaired Driving Education Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
Reinforcing Impaired Driving Education Act of 2019 or the RIDE Act of 2019
This bill requires the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration to establish a two-year pilot program to create and study the effects of a public marketing campaign to raise awareness on driving while under the influence of prescription and over-the-counter medications. The program shall be implemented in states or territories that are most affected by the opioid epidemic.
